00041         public:

00046

00054                 void create();
00055 
00058                 void remove();

00063                 inline void setActive(const bool& Active)
00064                 {
00065                         if (Active)
00066                         {
00067                             mRttManager->initialize(RttManager::RTT_GPU_NORMAL_MAP);
00068                         }
00069                         else
00070                         {
00071                             mRttManager->remove(RttManager::RTT_GPU_NORMAL_MAP);
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074 
00078                 inline const bool& isCreated() const
00079                 {
00080                         return mCreated;
00081                 }
00082 
00088                 inline Hydrax* getHydrax()
00089                 {
00090                         return mHydrax;
00091                 }
00092 
00096                 inline Ogre::MaterialPtr &getNormalMapMaterial()
00097                 {
00098                         return mNormalMapMaterial;
00099                 }
00100 
00105                 inline Ogre::TexturePtr &getTexture(const int& Index)
00106                 {
00107                         return mTextures.at(Index);
00108                 }
00109 
00113                 void addTexture(Ogre::TexturePtr &Texture)
00114                 {
00115                         mTextures.push_back(Texture);
00116                 }
00117 
00121                 inline void removeTexture(const int& Index)
00122                 {
00123                         Ogre::TextureManager::getSingleton().remove(mTextures.at(Index)->getName());
00124 
00125                         std::vector<Ogre::TexturePtr>::iterator TexIt = mTextures.begin() + Index;
00126 
00127                         mTextures.erase(TexIt);
00128                 }
00129
